Download list

Download list

Display multiple formats for a single download as a list item of many files.

On this page
  • Visual design
  • Guidelines for use
  • Layouts
  • Examples and assets

Visual design

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

Download list item

pdf · 0.70 MB
docx · 0.19 MB

Another list item

ppt · 0.70 MB

eps · 0.19 MB

CSS styles

Desktop & mobile

Download title
h4 {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 24px;
}

Link text

a {
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 12px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 24px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    text-decoration: none;
}
a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
}

Link icon

.icon {
    height: 16px;
    width: 16px;
}

Link colours

pdf {
    color: #CC3C1C;
}
docx {
    color: #2F70BF;
}
xls {
    color: #218080;
}
ppt {
    color: #A42079;
}
jpeg {
    color: #244E90;
}
eps {
    color: #5A43D0;
}

Guidelines for use

Purpose:

Displays multiple formats for a single download as a list item of many files.

When to use this component:

  • Use this to list tertiary download items (e.g. course documentation).

Layouts

Page layouts

Download lists should be used in two-third width pages.

Component layout options

Full width layout

Desktop, Tablet & Mobile: One component in a row.

Examples and assets

View download list design and assets in Adobe XD.
